wikipedia_page.main: Edmund John Holden Eckersley, (born 9 August 1989) is an English cricketer. He is a right-handed batsman and wicket-keeper. He was a core player of Leicestershire from 2011–2018. After his release from Leicestershire he signed for Durham.
